## Problem 1

```{r}
homicide_data = 
  read.csv("./data/homicide-data.csv") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  mutate(
    city_state = paste(city, state, sep=", ")
  )

homicide_data %>% 
  group_by(city) %>% 
  summarize(n_homicide = n())
  
homicide_data %>% 
  filter(disposition != "Closed by arrest") %>% 
  group_by(city) %>% 
  summarize(n_unsolved = n())
```
